title: Painful moment a teenager smacks himself in the head with a YOYO
text:
Awkward footage captures the moment a teenager accidentally smacks himself in the head with a yo-yo before dropping to the floor in pain.

The clip, filmed in the US, captures the teen as he practices performing tricks with his yo-yo inside his bedroom.

In his first attempt, he manages to successfully spin the toy around his hand three times before capturing it again in his palm.

The clip, filmed in the US, captures a teenager as he practices performing tricks with his yo-yo inside his bedroom

He then re-positions the toy in his hand, checking the string is secure around his finger before attempting the trick for a second time.

The teenager performs the simple spin twice more with no issues, before glancing at the camera to check it is still recording his efforts.

But then, on his last attempt, the teenager throws out the yo-yo too fiercely, resulting in it reeling back and smacking into the top of his head.

On his last attempt, the teenager throws out the yo-yo too fiercely, resulting in it reeling back and smacking into the top of his head

The teen grasps the back of his head in shock, keeling over and eventually laying on the floor.

He shouts in pain at the impact, repeatedly saying 'Ow!' as he moves out of shot of the camera he set up in his home.

The video, filmed on October 23, comes to a close as the teenager - who had been on the ground occasionally shouting in pain - gets up and turns off the camera.
description: The clip, filmed in the US, captures the teen as he practices tricks with his yo-yo inside his bedroom. In his first attempt, he manages to successfully spin the toy around his hand three times.
